summary: When Papi, Chloe, the pups, Uncle Pedro and their owners move to a hotel, the smallest pup Rosa feels like she doesn't fit in, and Papi wants to make her feel better by showing her how special she is.
cast: Marcus Coloma|Erin Cahill|Cedric Yarbrough|Frances Fisher|Briana Lane|Sebastian Roché|Jason Brooks|Kyle Gass|Amanda Fuller|Michael Lanahan|Sam Pancake|Eddie 'Piolin' Sotelo|Jeff Witzke|Cara Santana|George Lopez|Odette Annable|Ernie Hudson|Kay Panabaker|Logan Grove|Emily Osment|Madison Pettis|Delaney Jones|Tom Kenny|Jake Busey|Lacey Chabert|Miguel Ferrer|Phil LaMarr|Nick Eversman|Lev L. Spiro|Jon Curry|Ashley Boettcher|Garen Boyajian|John Colton|Clint Corley|Sheryl Hunter|Kamala Jones|Peter T. Mai|J.P. Manoux|Jesse McIntosh|Rick Silver|Andy Skauge|Desary Vailencour|Kerry Wieder|Cyrus Wymer
title: Un chihuahua en Beverly Hills 3: ¡Viva la fiesta!
